title: Getting started with Jakarta RESTful Services
content: The latest release of RESTEasy (6.1.0) provides an overview of what’s coming with Jakarta RESTful Web Services 3.1. which will be a core component of Jakarta EE 10. Let’s review through this article the upcoming features using RESTEasy (6.1.0) implementation. What’s new in Jakarta RESTful Web Services 3.1 One of the top features of the ...
